name: The Pit (itch) (Ckyre)
description:
Hello ! Wellcome on the page of "The Pit" game.

The Pit is FPS Shooter where you have to survive to enemy waves. This game has been made for the first edition of "Community Game Jam" so becarful to the game, it's a liar and something in the game does not work as it should. So, armed with your jetpack and your shotgun you will fight until death against your enemies.

W,A,S,D to move
Hold Space to use your jetpack
Left Click to shoot

Post Processing version will arrives after the end of the rating period
